ci_support_linux_c_compilergcccxx_compil:
build_number_decrement:
- '0'
c_compiler:
- gcc
channel_sources:
- conda-forge/label/gcc7,defaults
channel_targets:
- conda-forge gcc7
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
docker_image:
- conda/c3i-linux-64
zip_keys:
- - c_compiler
  - cxx_compiler
  - channel_sources
  - channel_targets
  - docker_image
  - build_number_decrement

about.description:
Unlike ports created by translators, this port reimplements the algorithms to
take advantage of C program structure and dynamic memory. Every effort has been
made to leave the low level code intact, except where some opportunity to convert
from unstructured blocks to more structured form was taken.
about.summary: A complete port of the QUADPACK Fortran codes to C

about.description:
Unlike ports created by translators, this port reimplements the algorithms to
take advantage of C program structure and dynamic memory. Every effort has been
made to leave the low level code intact, except where some opportunity to convert
from unstructured blocks to more structured form was taken.
about.summary: A complete port of the QUADPACK Fortran codes to C

name: cquadpack
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "cquadpack" %}
{% set version = "1.1.1" %}
{% set sha256 = "e193023a33b6b6d86d92935ddce4f1b7efe35e259e06c88bd45e20d7e896ae38" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://github.com/ESSS/{{ name }}/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 1000
  skip: True  # [osx]

requirements:
  build:
    - cmake
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
  host:
  run:

test:
  commands:
    - test -f $PREFIX/include/cquadpack.h  # [unix]
    - if not exist %LIBRARY_INC%\cquadpack.h exit 1  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/ESSS/cquadpack
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'A complete port of the QUADPACK Fortran codes to C'

  description: |
    Unlike ports created by translators, this port reimplements the algorithms to
    take advantage of C program structure and dynamic memory. Every effort has been
    made to leave the low level code intact, except where some opportunity to convert
    from unstructured blocks to more structured form was taken.
  dev_url: https://github.com/ESSS/cquadpack

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - edisongustavo

about.description:
Unlike ports created by translators, this port reimplements the algorithms to
take advantage of C program structure and dynamic memory. Every effort has been
made to leave the low level code intact, except where some opportunity to convert
from unstructured blocks to more structured form was taken.
about.summary: A complete port of the QUADPACK Fortran codes to C
